title: Human Motivation Design for Job Learning and Development

context.prior_knowledge: Over five years of organizational job experience and understanding of basic adult learning principles
context.additional_context: Requires content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments. Applies mobile-friendly pedagogical approaches to enhance real-time interaction

learning_goals: Learners can utilize at least three elements of Self-Determination Theory (SDT)-based motivational factors (autonomy, competence, relatedness) when designing job tasks
Learners can establish at least two strategies to enhance intrinsic motivation among organizational members by applying an integrated motivation model
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of job-learning programs with over 80% accuracy using research-based motivation measurement tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
